pageContext.description:
Late half-length portrait of Martin Luther against a neutral background, facing to his left. He is wearing a black coat and holds a small edition of the bible in his hands. 
[cda 2020]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 39.7 x 26.6 cm
[Online database Christie's: https://www.christies.com/lotfinder/lot/circle-of-lucas-cranach-i-portrait-of-1397227-details.aspx?; accessed 15.05.2020]
pageContext.inscription:
Inscription beneath the image:
'ISTE REPVRGATOR DOCTRINAE IE SORDE PAPATVS // TALIS IN INGENVA FRONTE LVTHERVS ERAT. // CORPORIS EFFIGIEM MEDIAM MANVS AMVLA PINXIT. // SE TOTVM IN SCRIPTIS PINGIT AT ILLE SVIS.'
